thread.section_title: Arts and Entertainment coverage for all ages and interests - San Francisco Chronicle
thread.title: Jaroslow & Dancers a welcome addition to Bay Area scene
thread.title_full: Jaroslow & Dancers a welcome addition to Bay Area scene - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Allan Ulrich
title: Jaroslow & Dancers a welcome addition to Bay Area scene
text:
Photo: Margo Mortiz. Resist Surrender Kelly and Scott.jpg Pictured (L-R): Scott Marlowe and Kelly Del Rosario Resist Surrender Kelly and Scott.jpg Pictured (L-R): Scott Marlowe...
It is not true that in the California dance world, all talent gravitates eastward. Two years ago, the acclaimed New York postmodernist dancer-choreographer Risa Jaroslow relocated to Oakland. She has wisely bided her time assembling a new company and preparing repertoire. The latest version of Jaroslow & Dancers made its debut Thursday evening at ODC Theater, and notwithstanding some reservations, the company has brought a distinctive quality to the scene. They should be around for a while. Resist Surrender Kelly and Scott.jpg Pictured (L-R): Scott Marlowe and Kelly Del Rosario Resist Surrender Kelly and Scott.jpg Pictured (L-R): Scott Marlowe...
It is not true that in the California dance world, all talent gravitates eastward. Two years ago, the acclaimed New York postmodernist dancer-choreographer Risa Jaroslow relocated to Oakland. She has wisely bided her time assembling a new company and preparing repertoire. The latest version of Jaroslow & Dancers made its debut Thursday evening at ODC Theater, and notwithstanding some reservations, the company has brought a distinctive quality to the scene. They should be around for a while.
